Gangguan, Telkomsel Klaim Layanan Data Internet Berangsur Pulih
05 Nov 2019, 15:54 by Francisca Christy Rosana, Zacharias Wuragil
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Jaringan Internet Telkomsel mengalami gangguan pada Selasa, 5 November 2019. Gangguan itu meliputi penurunan kualitas layanan data Internet yang menyebabkan akses jaringan melemah.
General Manager Corporate Communications Telkomsel Aldin Hasyim mengatakan, gangguan terjadi pada akses internet internasional Telkom Group. “Sedangkan untuk layanan voice dan SMS tetap berjalan normal,” katanya dalam keterangan tertulis.
Setelah dilakukan penanganan, Aldin memastikan layanan Internet berangsur pulih. Atas gangguan tersebut, Telkomsel menyampaikan permohonan maaf kepada pelanggan sembari menyatakan, "Kami terus mengupayakan agar layanan internet dapat kembali normal."
Masalah gangguan jaringan ini sempat viral di media sosial Twitter. Sejumlah pengguna Internet mengeluhkan adanya perlambatan akses data pribadi.
"Harapannya bisa segera normal kembali, lumpuh jaringan saya seharian ini, SIM card, indie home, WiFi-id,” kata pemilik akun @enoisme75.
Akun lain menyayangkan kinerja 4G Telkomsel yang semula digadang-gadang unggul di sisi kecepatan. “Percuma gan, update kartu ke 4G juga toh di 4G Telkomsel kecepatannta gitu-gitu aja hmm,” tulis @alwibeckham007.

Disruption, Telkomsel Claims Recovered Internet Data Services
05 Nov 2019, 15:54 by Francisca Christy Rosana, Zacharias Wuragil
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Telkomsel's internet network experienced a disruption on Tuesday, November 5, 2019. The disruption included a decrease in the quality of Internet data services which caused weakened network access.
General Manager of Telkomsel Corporate Communications Aldin Hasyim said, disruption occurred on Telkom Group's international internet access. "As for voice and SMS services, it continues to run normally," he said in a written statement.
After handling, Aldin ensured that Internet services would gradually recover. For the interruption, Telkomsel conveyed an apology to the customer while stating, "We continue to strive for internet services to return to normal."
This network disruption problem was viral on Twitter social media. Some Internet users have complained of slowing access to personal data.
"Hopefully it can return to normal soon, my network has been paralyzed all day, SIM card, indie home, WiFi-id," said the owner of the account @ enoisme75.
Another account regrets Telkomsel's 4G performance which was originally predicted to be superior in terms of speed. "It's useless, bro, updating the card to 4G anyway, at 4G Telkomsel, that's the speed, hmm," wrote @ alwibeckham007.
